text: # 0 = Sales
# 1 = Billing
# 2 = HR
# 3 = Support
I want to buy a product
I want to buy a new laptop from your store
I would like to know more about your product catalog and pricing.
Can you send me a quotation for bulk orders?
I want to purchase a new laptop from your store.
Do you offer discounts for corporate clients?
I am interested in upgrading my subscription plan.
Could you provide details about your latest promotions?
I want to buy software licenses for my team.
Please share the brochure for your services.
I need a demo of your product before purchase.
Can you arrange a meeting to discuss pricing?
I want to place an order for office equipment.
Do you sell accessories for laptops?
I am considering switching vendors, what are your offers?
Please send me the catalog of your new arrivals.
I want to know if you have a reseller program.
Can you provide a quote for 100 units?
I am interested in your enterprise solutions.
Do you have a trial version available?
I want to buy a subscription for cloud services.
Please send me the price list for your products.
I need to know if you ship internationally.
Can you provide warranty details for your products?
I want to purchase training materials for my staff.
Do you offer bundle deals for software?
I want to buy a new server from your company.
I need help with my invoice
My invoice shows the wrong amount
My invoice shows the wrong amount, please correct it.
I was charged twice for the same service.
Can you resend the receipt for my last payment?
My payment did not go through, can you check?
I need a copy of last month’s invoice.
Please update my billing address.
I want to change my payment method.
My credit card was declined, what should I do?
I was billed for a service I didn’t use.
Can you explain the charges on my account?
I need a breakdown of my monthly bill.
My invoice is missing some items.
I want to request a refund for overpayment.
Please send me the tax invoice for my purchase.
I was charged late fees incorrectly.
My subscription renewal was billed twice.
I need help with my billing statement.
Can you confirm if my payment was received?
My account shows pending charges, please clarify.
I want to update my VAT number on invoices.
Please correct the billing cycle for my account.
My invoice date is wrong, please fix it.
I need to reconcile my payment records.
Can you send me a duplicate invoice?
My billing shows services I didn’t request.
I’m applying for a job
I’m applying for the software engineer position
I am applying for the software engineer position.
Please find attached my CV for the HR department.
I want to know the status of my job application.
Can you confirm the interview schedule?
I am interested in the marketing manager role.
Please provide details about employee benefits.
I want to apply for an internship.
Can you share the job description for the analyst role?
I am submitting my resume for consideration.
Please confirm receipt of my application.
I want to know about training opportunities.
Can you explain the promotion process?
I am requesting leave for next month.
Please update my employment records.
I want to transfer to another department.
Can you provide the employee handbook?

Please confirm my onboarding schedule.
I want to know about career growth opportunities.
Can you share the salary range for the role?

Please confirm the probation period details.
I want to know about relocation support.
Can you provide details about health insurance?
I am submitting documents for background verification.
